channel.title: About the ActivityPub category
channel.description:
Discuss the [ActivityPub Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitypub/), how to implement it, how to extend it. Home of the ActivityPub <abbr title="Special Interest Group">SIG</abbr>.
